title: Error chat-id="{:updated-at nil, :unviewed-messages nil, :last-from-clock-value 0, :group-admin nil
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Error `chat-id="{:updated-at nil, :unviewed-messages nil, :last-from-clock-value 0, :group-admin nil, :color \"#a187d5\", :contacts [{:identity \"0x044cc1996bbe9635ca48763c41e710700fd463b453ead0877e0b292b43aba0766ce7c4cda4c94487c4c3eb67bb6f8ed2ae6fdc653ed29895daf04aad81a3fbfd66\", :is-in-chat true}], :name \"%##}{]{#%^+=\u2022\xA3\u20AC$>~|\\\\_.??\u2019\", :requests nil, :removed-from-at nil, :contact-info \"{:whisper-identity \\\"0x044cc1996bbe9635ca48763c41e710700fd463b453ead0877e0b292b43aba0766ce7c4cda4c94487c4c3eb67bb6f8ed2ae6fdc653ed29895daf04aad81a3fbfd66\\\", :public-key \\\"38470eb05e06680c03fba05e2900b8094166d31af31f6159479496ae78326162ab335ee63e1177cc92ad85a7308abff9a4d37767fe9d538a5e952fd26bdca056c031f594c5b80db33e95f36bfbb135b6284b24ab41af251e2d992d6ec87ead82041\\\", :private-key \\\"384e32b962b237e14a99f5db4091f051554cadb4c9c041c3f2b40f264092e98c60295ff0df2a16bbb29ba7a09d510e128b5\\\", :address \\\"0dcd5cea2417ebadabff09f3c462d9d5a707c5e7\\\", :status \\\"fight for greater course than for greater loss\\\", :photo-path \\\"data:image/png;base64,
00:55 I/HwPointEventFilter: do not support AFT because of no config`

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
able to remove chat

#### Actual behavior
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/37587216-bd63d732-2b6f-11e8-9069-8d7ea5a7d8a1.png)

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- as iOS device set up `%##}{]{#%^+=•£€$>~|\_.??’` name in user profile 
- as Android - add iOS to contacts and send a message to 1x1 chat
- as Android - remove the chat with iOS device


### Additional Information

* Status version: nightly 19/03/2018
* Operating System: Android, iOS

#### Logs
https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7912666/sessions/44/?accessToken=6KPRNHVrcdeYdbBhAIkaNwE6bg8

will be fixed in scope of https://github.com/status-im/ideas/issues/87
Note: Happens only for swipe to delete. It works fine when chat is removed from chat option menu (Delete chat)
@annadanchenko could you please check if this is already fixed in develop ? If yes, please close the issue
@janherich i checked that in develop and can't reproduce anymore. Closing
